title: Life expectancy of women in Mexico 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Life expectancy at birth in years has stayed the same over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2014, and finally roughly constant from 2014 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Life expectancy at birth in years, of value 78.04 was reached at Year 2007
The lowest Life expectancy at birth in years, of value 77.83 was reported at Year 2016, and 2017
